greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of forests of rooted identity trees with 2n colored nodes using exactly n colors.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..188
maple: b:= proc(n, k) option remember; `if`(n<2, n, add(b(n-j, k)*add(b(d, k)
a:= n-> add(b(2*n+1, n-i)*(-1)^i*binomial(n, i), i=0..n):
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Aug 26 2019
